title: Kane and Abel
author: Jeffrey Archer
description: They had only one thing in common . . . William Lowell Kane and Abel Rosnovski: one the son of a Boston millionaire, the other of a penniless Polish immigrant. Two men born on the same day, on opposite sides of the world, their paths destined to cross in the ruthless struggle to build a fortune. A memorable story, spanning sixty years, of two powerful men linked by an all-consuming hatred, brought together by fate to save â€“ and finally destroy â€“ each other. â€˜The ultimate novel of sibling rivalryâ€™ Dan Brown
